text: Shikashi shinko no nai mono wa, sono suru koto nasu koto, sabaku no naka no shinkiro no yona mono de, kawaki kitta mono ni wa mizuda to omowa reru. Daga yattekureba nani mo midasenai. Sokode wa arra no gozendeari, kare no kanjo ga harawa reru koto o shirudearou. Arra wa seisan ni jinsokude ara reru
